title: Evacuation issued after fire reignites at Georgia plant
description: An evacuation was issued after a large fire reignited at a plant in Brunswick, Georgia, on Saturday, officials said.

title: Freight train engines, cars derail and catch fire in Maine
description: Officials say several cars on a freight train derailed and caught fire in Maine.

title: Resort famous for Elvis' 'Blue Hawaii' movie will be rebuilt
description: The resort was heavily damaged by a hurricane three decades ago.

title: 2 shot dead at house party near James Madison University
description: Two people were shot and killed at a house party near James Madison University in Virginia, police said. No suspects have been arrested yet.

title: Rutgers, unions announce agreement, classes to resume
description: Rutgers University and union representatives have announced an agreement.

title: WATCH:  Protesters interrupt DeSantis speech at New Hampshire fundraising event
description: Protesters interrupted Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis’s speech at a Republican Party fundraising event in New Hampshire on Friday.

title: Suspect in murder of Indiana teen girls wins prison transfer
description: The suspect in the killing of two teenage girls in Indiana will be transferred to another state correctional facility after the suspect’s attorneys argued his physical and mental health was deteriorating after months in isolation

title: Hospital sues Missouri's top prosecutor over trans care data
description: Missouri's AG demanded records in investigation into gender-affirming care.

title: Poland prohibits food imports from Ukraine to soothe farmers
description: Poland will temporarily prohibit grain and other food imports from Ukraine.

title: Italy's Meloni acknowledges 'anomalies' in Russian escape
description: A Russian businessman escaped from house arrest to avoid extradition to U.S.

title: NATO member Finland breaks ground on Russia border fence
description: The barbed-wired fence is primarily meant to curb illegal migration.

title: West Virginia man accused of arson, murder in wildfire death
description: A forestry worker was killed fighting a fire the man is accused of setting.

title: Report finds democracy for Black Americans is under attack
description: National Urban League says some top threats to democracy hit Black Americans

title: Why document leak suspect had a high-level top secret security clearance
description: Accused leaker Jack Teixeira had a top secret clearance but new questions are being asked about how the IT specialist had access to high-level documents.

title: Bus with musicians crashes in western India, killing 13
description: A passenger bus carrying dozens of members of a music troupe has fallen into a gorge in western India, killing 13 people and injuring 29

title: Guitarist Mark Sheehan of Irish band The Script dies at 46
description: Ireland’s president has led tributes to Mark Sheehan of Irish rock band The Script after the guitarist's death at age 46

title: Sustained firing heard in Sudanese capital amid tensions
description: Sustained firing has broken out in the Sudanese capital amid simmering tensions between the military and the country’s powerful paramilitary forces

title: 3 American sailors missing off the coast of Mexico
description: The Mexican Navy and United States Coast Guard are searching for three missing American sailors who have not been seen since April 4.

title: Explosion at Japan port during PM Kishida visit, no injuries
description: Japan’s NHK television is reporting that a loud explosion occurred at a western Japanese port during Prime Minister Fumio Kishida’s visit, but there were no injuries

title: WATCH:  Escaped emu leads police on 20-mile chase
description: An emu named MeeMoo led police on a 20-mile chase in Tennessee before being safely returned to its owner.

title: Trump's new financial filing shows his number of business holdings has doubled
description: A new financial disclosure report filed by Donald Trump shows that the former president has doubled his number of business holdings since leaving the White House.

title: Uvalde school district's insurance paying legal fees of lawsuits
description: Former school police chief Pete Arredondo and former principal Mandy Gutierrez are defendants in multiple lawsuits.

title: TikTok ban gets final approval by Montana's GOP legislature
description: Montana lawmakers have given final passage to a bill banning the social media app TikTok in the state
